Tags:

 

  • Paul Graham on The List of N Things
  • Lists can save lives!

    With doctors having so much to keep in mind during urgent situations, simple to do lists can help ensure steps aren't missed, and the procedures are done consistently effectively. In the "The Checklist Manifesto" Atul Gawande describes how John Hopkins hospital eradicated central line infections in the intensive care unit by employing a simple to do list.

  • Online Technical Writing: Lists

    A case for using lists in technical writing to increase readability, as well as structured guidelines on how to use lists profesionally

  • I Love Lists

    Marji at FiberArts Afloat, officially declares her love of lists, and suggests a few ways for domestic goddesses to take advantage of the list-building phenomenon.

  • 5 Reasons Why We All Click on Lists

    Tremendous News offers five explanations - in list-form of course - about why people love lists.

  • Everybody Loves Lists

    Social media marketer, Darren Barefoot muses over the fact that Everybody Loves Lists.
